resources.string:
Dont be afraid to hide out in the blue early on. 
Terrain can be just as good cover as any building or wall. 
ALWAYS take a level three helmet 
but sometimes leave a level three vest. 
Play the edge of the circle. 
Keep yourself boosted up late game. 
Hiding in bushes works surprisingly well.

Always be aware of your surroundings in game modes 
Study any all star player climb to learn the best moves from fellow players 
Stay alert and stay ahead of the game! 
collect power ups 
upgrade brawlers collect unique skins 
clear paths to the enemies treasure 
achieve a star player climb up local and regional leaderboards

Be sure to have a powerful deck 
If you are stuck with a bad hand, wait for your opponent to make the first move 
Stay alert and stay ahead of the game! 
Choose a crown tower to focus on and continue attacking it. 
Get positive elixir trades. 
Prepare powerful combinations of troops 
Use less reliable ways to win or lose quickly.

Take a good look at the game field before starting 
If you are stuck with a bad hand, wait for your opponent to make the first move 
Stay alert and stay ahead of the game 
Choose a crown tower to focus on and continue attacking it 
Sometimes you should ignore the games prompts 
Combine powerups 
Get help from other players in our fan group

Conserve Fragile Resin Until the Late Game 
Develop Your Serenitea Pot 
Stay alert and stay ahead of the game! 
Take Advantage of the Reputation System 
Get positive elixir trades. 
Skip the Weapon Banner

Start your candy crushing at the bottom 
Try to think ahead when possible 
Stay alert and stay ahead of the game! 
Learn how to make, and use special candies 
Look for combos, and use the best ones 
Use and make striped candy the right way 
Prioritize specific threats at each level
